name: Head Hunt (Joseph Dasilva)
description:
It's rough being the Headless, Horseless Man.  You have to use a pumpkin as a head that skeletons and hands keep chasing you for, and you don't even get to use a horse like that other headless guy.  But that's fine, at least you have a sword to protect yourself.

Run through levels while killing skeletons, collecting coins, and avoiding the wall of death.
